about_the_game:
■Game Features
Simple character control + stage gimmicks to be unlocked at the same time.
This is a finger-tip confusing action puzzle.
Challenge yourself with numerous difficult puzzles!

There are more than 60 stages! Take your time or compete for time.
It's up to you how you enjoy it!

■Story
Somewhere unknown...
I wandered into
A girl who looks like a cat
To go somewhere other than here
Aiming for the exit

■ Screen Operations
[Esc] Switch to full screen
[F1] Show/hide the top menu bar

[Notes]
You may freely create video games and play videos regardless of whether you are an individual or a company, and whether or not you monetize your work, as long as you meet the following conditions

URL to the Steam store page must be included.
　
Please mention that the game is "made by Pixel Game Maker MV" and introduce it in the video distribution.
　

[Requests]
Please mention "NYANxTECH" in the video title or description if possible.
Please do not distribute only the music.

[Included image materials]
You are free to use any of the images in the materials.zip folder for your own use, including thumbnails.
Selling or distributing individual images is prohibited.

■Game Description
This is a side-scrolling platformer created with "Pixel Game Maker MV," a program that allows anyone to easily create action games!

"Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series where you can enjoy games created using the action game production software " Pixel Game Maker MV".

name: Pixel Game Maker Series NYANxTECH

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Pixel Game Maker Series NYANxTECH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Additional Notes: DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • Additional Notes: DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: Simple character control + stage gimmicks to be unlocked at the same time. This is a finger-tip confusing action puzzle. Challenge yourself with numerous difficult puzzles!
